title: Owl Ninja
description: The kids from the Cockroach Ryu are back and this time they join forces with the Owl Ninja clan!The fifty years of peace that has ruled over the samurai ryus is coming to an end and only the Emperor can stop it. The kids from the Cockroach Ryu are back and make it their mission to get the Emperor to stop the coming war. But the last time the Emperor saw Sensei, he threatened to cut off his head! Will they be able to protect their Sensie and stop a battle?
author: Sandy Fussell
